price: a svima smo primjere za pouku navodili, i sve smo poslije sasvim uništili.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wakullan ḍarabnā lahu al-amthāla wakullan tabbarnā tatbīran
